document_data.name: Aelgar
document_data.mainbody:
'''Aelgar the Fierce''' was a [[barbarian]] who took up residence in the city of [[Neverwinter]] for a time during the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
{{Quote|[[Uthgar]] the Battle Father smiles this day!|Aelgar, after victory in battle.}}
document_data.Description: Aelgar venerated [[Uthgar]], the deity of the [[Uthgardt]] people.
document_data.History: After the [[Siege of Neverwinter]], in the {{YearlinkName|1479}}, Aelgar stationed himself at the [[Neverwinter Guard]] post in the city's [[Tower District]]. While there he led the city's defenders against waves of attacks made upon them by the [[Many-Arrows]] [[orc]]s. Among the marauding assailants was the enormous [[ogre]], [[Mog|Mog the Crusher]].
